text: Kulaŋ 12.25 1 Ko 15.42, 15.49, 15.51-52 iamɨgali hɨmavɨmalɨ agɨlaŋ cɨku hɨki iakaiaka mɨkiŋ hɨvɨ hɨki iakɨbalɨhavi uamalɨ. Iaka kulaŋ agɨlaŋ cɨku iamɨgali ma lɨbibalɨhavi uamalɨ. Iamɨgali agɨlaŋ aveji cɨku muŋaŋ ma iakubalɨhavi uamalɨ. Nɨbɨlaŋ Asɨ dɨ ciaŋ hali hɨsɨŋ agɨlaŋ me nudɨ kɨlebɨla hen hɨnibalɨhavi uamalɨ.
